Title: Hisaab

HomeWiki:
Project Description

 
Hisaab is a personal finance manager. It is aimed to provide management for home budget. Using advanced UI feature like Office ribbons and Outlook style navigation.

 

Current releases support basic transaction editing features. Please see the future plans for the produt.

Screenshots

Main Screen

Transaction View 

Features Planned

  1. Import bank data
  2. Bills
  3. Targets
  4. Budget Planning and forecast
  5. ﻿﻿﻿Multiple currency support

Please feel free to suggest any feature you want as part of this product
